EmailTemplate.subject: NOKIA Care - New Support Case “{!Case.CaseNumber}” created for “{!Case.Account}”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Nokia Care via {!Case.Origin}. We appreciate your continued business and the opportunity to assist you with your enquiry.
Your {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created and is currently being directed to the appropriate Support Engineer. You will be contacted by an assigned Engineer regarding this {!Case.Type}.
Issue: {!Case.Title__c}
If you would like to view or update your case online, please visit: <hyperlink><name>Link to Customer Portal
If you do not have online access, you may register here:
<hyperlink><name>Link to Customer Portal Registration
Regards, Nokia Care
